caption: This photograph depicts a lively, joyful scene in a swimming pool. The pool is occupied by several older women, likely participating in an aerobics class or some form of group exercise, evident by their synchronized raised arms and cheerful expressions. One woman in the foreground is smiling broadly, wearing a wide-brimmed hat and large sunglasses which highlight her enjoyment. Behind her, another woman can be seen also smiling, adorned with large white-framed sunglasses and a swimming cap decorated with colorful patterns, adding a playful touch to her outfit. The other participants are similarly dressed in various swim caps and swimming costumes, each contributing to the colorful, vibrant atmosphere of the activity. The clear blue water of the pool shimmers under sunlight, enhancing the overall cheerful, communal feel of the scene. The background is not in sharp focus, emphasizing the interaction and energy among the women in the water.
title: Residents of the Century Village retirement community take part in organized daily exercises.
